description: Enable AI assistants to manage and monitor song requests and queues for streamers seamlessly. Interact with StreamerSongList APIs to fetch streamer info, queue stats, and control song requests. Simplify music request management for streaming platforms without requiring authentication.

defaultStreamer.description: Default streamer name to use when not specified

capabilities.name: getStreamerByName
capabilities.description: Fetch detailed information about a specific streamer

capabilities.name: getQueue
capabilities.description: View current song queues with pagination support

capabilities.name: monitorQueue
capabilities.description: Monitor queue changes with configurable polling intervals

capabilities.name: getSongs
capabilities.description: Fetch the complete song list for a streamer with pagination support

capabilities.name: searchSongs
capabilities.description: Search within a streamer's song list by title or artist

capabilities.name: getSongDetails
capabilities.description: Get detailed information about a specific song by ID
